General.Name: SMS Electric Co Ltd Zhengzhou
General.Description: SMS Electric Co.,Ltd.Zhengzhou engages in the research, design, production, and sale of electricity metering instruments, electricity transformers, and electricity load management acquisition terminals in China. It provides standard test devices, portable meter test systems, energy meter terminals, testing automation products, and simulation equipment. The company also exports its products to Korea, Australia, Mongolia, Denmark, India, Pakistan, Vietnam, Bangladesh, and internationally. SMS Electric Co.,Ltd.Zhengzhou was founded in 1996 and is based in Zhengzhou, China.
